| First                   = Thor #160
| History                 = The Wanderers were a group of [[Archeopians]] and various alien races who were survivors from planets devoured by [[Galan (Earth-616)|Galactus]]. Their mission was to hunt down and destroy Galactus. When the [[Asgardians|Asgardian]] thunder god [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor]] also sought out Galactus, one of the Wanderers' ships followed Thor into the mysterious [[Black Galaxy]]. {{r|Thor #160}} They witnessed as Thor prevented Galactus from consuming [[Egros (Earth-616)|Ego the Living Planet]]. 

In the aftermath of the battle, Ego offered the Wanderers whose ship was ruined, sanctuary on his surface. He changed his form into an Earth-like planet for them to reside. The Wanderers agreed to settle on Ego to live out the rest of their lives. {{r|Thor #161}} However this turned out to be a cruel jest on the part of Ego the Living Planet. As soon as Thor had departed, he consumed the Wanderer's.{{r|Fantastic Four #235}}

Since then another group of Galactus survivors have banned together, calling themselves the [[Survivors (Earth-616)|Survivors]].{{r|Fantastic Four #517|519}}
| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = The Wanderers flew a varied fleet of starships originating from the various homeworlds each member came from.
